name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, Open Haiku Reader”
”Ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
”Tell Haiku Reader to give me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haikun Reader allows you to listen to a series of different themed haikus, selected at random. Some haikus can be impactful, while others can be funny or random.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
